original_title: Plymouth Montserrat: The Latter Day Pompeii
overview: On July 18th of 1995, Montserrat's sleeping volcano rumbled back to life after hundreds of years of dormancy. This is the ten year story of that eruption and it's effects on the people of, 'The Emerald Isle of the Caribbean'.
title: Plymouth Montserrat: The Latter Day Pompeii
